description:
DisplayFusion will make your multi-monitor life much easier! With powerful features like Multi-Monitor Taskbars, TitleBar Buttons and fully customizable HotKeys, DisplayFusion will make managing your multiple monitors easy.


- Change: Unblocked some hotkeys for Windows versions lower than Windows 11 24H2
- Change: New Advanced Setting: Don't check the reserved hotkey list
- Fix: Steam branding logo no longer doubled-up on scaled monitors
- Fix: Binary Fortress account message on login control no longer cropped on scaled monitors
- Fix: Taskbar clock no longer disappears when text size set to 30
- Fix: Taskbar clock text now correctly centered vertically on Windows 10 with "Use small icons" enabled
